gui.roadweaver.debug_map.title: RoadWeaver - Debug Map
toast.roadweaver.manual_multiplayer_not_: Manual connect is not supported in multiplayer yet
config.roadweaver.title: RoadWeaver Configuration
config.roadweaver.structureToLocate.tool: Enter one structure or tag per line. Examples: #minecraft:village, minecraft:village_plains, modid:custom_structure. Tags (#namespace:path) and direct IDs are supported.
Search radius for structures (in chunks). Higher value = wider search area but slower. Default: 100 (1600 blocks)
config.roadweaver.initialLocatingCount: Number of structures to locate on world load
config.roadweaver.initialLocatingCount.t: Select the number of structures to locate on world load. Higher number = longer loading time
config.roadweaver.maxConcurrentRoadGener: Maximum number of roads that can be generated simultaneously. Lower values reduce performance impact but slow down road generation. Default: 3
config.roadweaver.structureSearchTrigger: Number of chunks to load before triggering new structure search. Range 150-1500, lower values search more frequently. Default: 500
config.roadweaver.averagingRadius.toolti: Amount of terrain averaging done for artificial roads. Higher values create smoother roads but may look unnatural. Default: 1
config.roadweaver.allowArtificial.toolti: Whether artificial roads (stone bricks, slabs, etc.) are allowed to generate
config.roadweaver.allowNatural.tooltip: Whether natural roads (dirt, gravel, etc.) are allowed to generate
config.roadweaver.structureDistanceFromR: Distance in blocks between large decorative structures and road center. Higher values place structures farther from roads. Default: 4
config.roadweaver.maxHeightDifference.to: Maximum height difference allowed for roads. Higher values allow steeper roads. Default: 5
config.roadweaver.maxTerrainStability.to: Terrain stability threshold. Higher values allow rougher terrain. Default: 4
config.roadweaver.placeWaypoints.tooltip: Disables road generation in favor of waypoint generation (for testing and debugging)
config.roadweaver.placeRoadFences.toolti: Generate intermittent fence decorations along roads for enhanced visual appeal
config.roadweaver.placeSwings.tooltip: Generate swing decorations at suitable locations to add playfulness to roads
config.roadweaver.placeBenches.tooltip: Generate bench decorations along roads to provide resting spots
config.roadweaver.placeGloriettes.toolti: Generate gloriette decorations along roads to enhance road scenery
config.roadweaver.manualMaxHeightDiffere: Maximum height difference allowed in manual connect mode. More aggressive than normal mode, used for retrying failed roads. Default: 8
config.roadweaver.manualMaxTerrainStabil: Terrain stability threshold in manual connect mode. More lenient than normal mode to improve success rate. Default: 8
config.roadweaver.manualIgnoreWater.tool: When enabled, manual connections will ignore water biome costs, allowing roads to go directly through oceans and rivers. Useful for cross-sea connections. Default: OFF
roadweaver.debug_map.no_permission: You don't have permission to open the debug map (requires admin permission)
roadweaver.debug_map.multiplayer_not_sup: Debug map is not supported on multiplayer servers yet
roadweaver.debug_map.timeout: Failed to load debug data, please try again
